dcterms:creator: L. Vesterdal
I. K. Schmidt
I. Callesen
L. O. Nilsson
P. Gundersen
dcterms:description: This dataset contains information on carbon and nitrogen in the forest floor and mineral soil under six common European tree species, highlighting the differences in soil properties influenced by tree species.
dcterms:title: Common garden experiment with six European tree species

dcterms:creator: L. Vesterdal
B. Elberling
J. R. Christiansen
I. Callesen
I. K. Schmidt
dcterms:description: This dataset provides insights into soil respiration and rates of soil carbon turnover among six common European tree species, emphasizing the differences in microbial activity.
dcterms:title: Soil microbial communities and their activity

dcterms:creator: L. Vesterdal
N. Clarke
B. D. Sigurdsson
P. Gundersen
dcterms:description: This dataset examines whether tree species influence soil carbon stocks in temperate and boreal forests, providing valuable data on soil carbon dynamics.
dcterms:title: Soil C and N stocks

dcterms:creator: I. Callesen
L. O. Nilsson
I. K. Schmidt
L. Vesterdal
P. Ambus
J. R. Christiansen
P. Gundersen
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the natural abundance of 15N in litter and soil profiles under six temperate tree species, exploring nitrogen cycling traits and their dependence on tree species and site fertility.
dcterms:title: 15N abundance and N cycling traits

dcterms:creator: J. R. Christiansen
L. Vesterdal
I. Callesen
B. Elberling
I. K. Schmidt
P. Gundersen
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates the role of six European tree species and land-use legacy for nitrogen and water budgets in forests, providing insights into nutrient cycling.
dcterms:title: N and water balances
